title: Dynamic, Elegant Web Design & Development
content:
Hi! My name is Joshua Edwards and I am a full stack developer. I have done a number of projects utilizing both front end and back end web technologies. My goal is to always produce dynamic and feature rich web applications through an agile, test-driven process. I like creating web standards compliant websites with rich user experiences using UX principles.

I have skils in working with html5, css, sass, javascript, jQuery, angularJS, python, flask, react, ruby, and Ruby on Rails. I like to use the Scrum methodology in managing app development and test driven development for creating applications. In this way I can produce applications efficiently while also ensuring quality code.

I am currently available to work on projects. If you have a project in mind simply Contact Me with information about your project and what your development needs are for it. You can also click the link below to have a look at my resume.
